result.execSummary:
The defendant Trevor L Thomas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Trevor L Thomas is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Trevor L Thomas was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Trevor L Thomas was found guilty of Possess w/ Intent/Deliver Narcotics [Modifiers: Repeater], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: You are ordered to submit and comply with an assessment by the approved public treatment facility for your county of residence, as defined in s.51.45(2)(c), Wis. Stats

miscConds.notes: PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURT, ANY BOND APPLIES.
Per Wis. Stats. 973.015 Defendant may qualify for expungment upon successful completion of probation and payment of all costs.
$341 seized cash to be forfeited to Wisconsin School Fund.

timeConds.notes: Conditional jail to be used by PO Agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

judgments.dispoDesc: Def shall notify COC & DA's office w//in 72 hours any change of address, def shall commit no further violations of State or Federal criminal law,def successfully complete probation, def shall not possess any controlled subs or drug para. If successful the State will dismiss.

supervisions.notes: PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURTS, ANY BOND POSTED MAY BE APPLIED.
May not possess or use any firearms.
